injuries.name: Intracranial Hemorrhage
injuries.desc:
(can record only once)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

You cannot gain or spend survival

injuries.name: Deaf
injuries.desc:
(can record only once)
-1 permanent evasion.

You cannot be encouraged.

injuries.name: Blind
injuries.desc:
(can record twice)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

First Injury: -1 permanent accuracy.
Second Injury: -4 permanent accuracy and retire at end of showdown or settlement phase.

injuries.name: Shattered Jaw
injuries.desc:
(can record only once)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

You cannot consume.

You cannot Encourage.

injuries.name: Dismembered Arm
injuries.desc:
(can record twice)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

First Injury: Cannot activate two-handed weapons.
Second Injury: Cannot activate any weapons.

injuries.name: Ruptured Muscle
injuries.desc:
(can record only once)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

You cannot activate Fighting Arts.

injuries.name: Contracture
injuries.desc:
(can record multiple times)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

-1 permanent accuracy

injuries.name: Broken Arm
injuries.desc:
(can record twice)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

-1 permanent accuracy.

-1 permanent strength.

injuries.name: Dislocated Shoulder
injuries.desc:
(until the showdown ends)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

You cannot activate two-handed or paired weapons or use block.

injuries.name: Gaping Chest Wound
injuries.desc:
(can record multiple times)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

-1 permanent strength.

injuries.name: Destroyed Back
injuries.desc:
(can record only once)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

-1 permanent movement.

Cannot activate gear with 2+ strength.

injuries.name: Disemboweled
injuries.desc:
(until the showdown ends)
Gain +1 bleeding token.
Skip next hunt.

Movement is 1.

If you are the only survivor alive when showdown ends, you die.

injuries.name: Broken Rib
injuries.desc:
(can record multiple times)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

-1 permanent speed.

injuries.name: Intestinal Prolapse
injuries.desc:
(can record only once)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

You cannot equip gear to your waist.

injuries.name: Warped Pelvis
injuries.desc:
(can record multiple times)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

-1 permanent luck.

injuries.name: Destroyed Genitals
injuries.desc:
(can record only once)
Gain +1 bleeding token, a random disorder, and +3 insanity.

You are Knocked Down.

You cannot be nominated for Intimacy.

injuries.name: Broken Hip
injuries.desc:
(can record only once)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

-1 permanent movement.

You cannot Dodge.

injuries.name: Slashed Back
injuries.desc:
(until the showdown ends)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

You cannot Surge.

injuries.name: Bruised Tail-bone
injuries.desc:
(until the showdown ends)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

You are Knocked Down.

You cannot Dash.

injuries.name: Dismembered Leg
injuries.desc:
(can record twice)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

-2 permanent movement.

You cannot Dash.
Second Injury: Retire at end of showdown or settlement phase

injuries.name: Hamstrung
injuries.desc:
(can record only once)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

You cannot use Fighting Arts or Abilities.

injuries.name: Torn Achilles Tendon
injuries.desc:
(until the showdown ends)
Gain +1 bleeding token.
Skip next hunt.

You cannot Dash

injuries.name: Broken Leg
injuries.desc:
(can record twice)
Gain +1 bleeding token.

-1 permanent Movement

When suffered, adjacent survivors suffer 1 brain damage.

injuries.name: Frenzy
injuries.desc:
(can gain multiple times)
Gain +1d5 insanity.
Gain +1 speed, +1 strength tokens.
You cannot spend survival (unless you have Bitter Frenzy). You cannot use fighting arts, weapon specialization or mastery.

(Lasts until end of showdown)

abilities.name: Sweet Battle
abilities.desc: Once per round, you may Surge without spending survival, but it must be used to activate a weapon.

abilities.name: Bitter Frenzy
abilities.desc: Each Showdown, the first time you suffer the Frenzy brain trauma, gain 1d10 Survival. You may spend survival while Frenzied.

abilities.name: Sour Death
abilities.desc: When you are knocked down, you may Encourage yourself (even if you are Deaf). If you do, gain +1 Strength token.

abilities.name: Ageless
abilities.desc: You may hunt if you are retired. When you gain Hunt XP, you may decide not to gain it. (Saviors cannot use Ageless).

abilities.name: Peerless
abilities.desc: When you gain Insanity, you may gain an equal amount of Survival.

abilities.name: Leyline Walker
abilities.desc: While there is no armor or accessory gear in your gear grid, gain +3 evasion.

abilities.name: Story of the Forsaker
abilities.desc: You cannot be knocked down during a showdown with a nemesis monster.

abilities.name: Story of the Young Hero
abilities.desc: At the start of each of your acts, you may choose to gain 1 survival and 2 bleeding tokens.

abilities.name: Story of the Goblin
abilities.desc: Once per showdown, you may roll 1d10. On a 3+, gain the priority target token and the monster gains +1 damage token.
